cause.description:
The Comic Con International is the largest comics and pop culture convention in the world.
The convention is not only limited to comics, but also manga, movies, television, and video games. The convention consists of a huge trade floor, an independent movie festival, and the annual Star Wars and Masquerade awards.
CCI is also the host of the The Eisner Awards and the Robert A. Heinlein Blood Drive.
1. The promotion of comics in art and culture.
cause.mission: Create awareness of, and appreciation for, comics and related popular art forms.
cause.name: Comic-Con International
